roleset.name: (cause to) become afraid
roleset.note: FRIGHTEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'frighten' based on transformation of 'scare'; adjectival 'frightening' found in BOLT-7. (from frighten.01-v)
FRIGHTENING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from frightening.01-j)

roles.note: Unlike some of the other verbs which haven't tried to distinguishagent and subject, you really must try with psych verbs. It's bad enough that we're ignoring the distinction between intentional agentand non-intentional (but still non-instrumental) agent. For example,in the second example, did Mary really *mean* to frighten John, or was itan accident? The former would make her an intentional agent, thelatter an unintentional agent. This can only be determined by a LOTof context, which we don't have, and even then it can be hard to tell. (from frighten.01-v)

example.name: frighten-v: transitive
example.text: Such disclosures of big holdings often are used by raiders-1 *trace*-1 to try *trace*-1 to frighten a company's managers.

example.name: frighten-v: with instrument
example.text: Mary frightened John with her blood-red fingernails.

example.name: frighten-v: with intensifier
example.text: It won't take [much more]-1 *trace*-1 to ``frighten the hell out of retail investors,'' he says.

example.name: frighten-v: another intensifier example
example.text: ``Small investors are absolutely dismayed that Wall Street is stacking the deck against them, and these wide swings are frightening them to death.

example.name: frightening-j
example.text: The property price is indeed frightening , and there are people speculating in real estate everyday

example.name: fright-n
example.text: each player discusses his fright at the possibility of vampires existing
example.arg: at the possibility of vampires existing

roleset.name: frighten and make go away
roleset.note: FRIGHTEN_OFF-V NOTES: This is pretty clearly an intentional subject, but frighten off couldalso take an unintentional subject. (from frighten.02-v)

example.name: frighten_off-v: automatically generated
example.text: [Their opposition]-1 helped *trace*-1 frighten off some Japanese banks .

example.name: frighten_away-v: automatically generated
example.text: Mr. DaPuzzo also complained that the sharp swings in stock prices lately is frightening away retail and foreign investors.
example.arg: the sharp swings in stock prices

example.name: fright-n
example.text: each player discusses his fright at the possibility of vampires existing
example.arg: at the possibility of vampires existing
